Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: We believe the BS Edison Award release from $WATT was intended to cover up negative overnight iPhone 8 wireless charging news from Asia

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Overnight, KGI Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, most knowledgeable $AAPL source in Asia, issued report confirming iPhone 8 has inductive charging pad,

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Apple Daily confirmed iPhone 8 includes “charging blankets,” specifically stating wireless charging technology was incompatible with $WATT

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: $WATT tried to cover up this news with promotional Edison Award release this AM (1/n)

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: $WATT said “Energous joins the ranks of previous Edison Award winners including: 3M, Nvidia, Logitech, GE, Lenovo, Tesla, SpaceX, Fitbit.”

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: $WATT cherry-picked list of winners ignored stock promotion Edison Award winners: $EYES, $NQ, $ONVO, $AMRS, 7779 JT, $DDD, & Theranos.

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: KGI analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, who repeatedly = most accurate unveiling future iPhone specs, issued report breaking new iPhone 8 details. $WATT

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Kuo said multiple iPhone 8 models, “bezel-less” design w/OLED display, glass casing, & indctve chgin w/close-range inductive mat. srry $WATT

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Apple Daily also reported overnight that the iPhone 8 would use inductive charging and that $WATT was not included https://t.co/KJmBwmFfOW

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Curiously timed blog post on tech rumor site Technadu titled “Apple iPhone 8 comes with 15 ft Wireless Charging System by Energous.”  $WATT

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: iPhone 8 design specs are complete, $WATT has no WattUp long range FCC approval, and KGI and Apple Daily reporting otherwise (1/2)

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text:
Yet blog post on rumor site & Edison Award "news" hit for $WATT 12 hrs after overnight news. Tie together here (2/2)
https://t.co/BjdllYacFY

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Bottom line on $WATT news: Multiple reputable sources from Asia = charging blankets & an inductive strategy tied to Pegatron. Very specific

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: On Edison Award, is $WATT the next $NVDA, $GE, $TSLA (its chosen comps), or the next $EYES, $NQ, $ONVO, $AMRS, $DDD or Theranos (winners 2)
